description:
Chapter 2 - Across The River And Into The Trees --
In this second installment of a 7-part episodic series inspired by the literary works of Ernest Hemingway, we see that Master Doc has taken Paige to his Sanctum Santorum Dungeon for punishment and training. After putting her in a partial rope suspension, he warms her up with a hard flogging and them proceeds to a harsh single tail whipping and caning which breaks her down into sub space. As a reward, he brings her to a massive squirting orgasm (well, not a reward for him as he now has Paige Juice all over this dungeon floor!)
title: Turning the Paige: Chapter 2
